topic.title: All-in-One Digital Banking Solution
topic.shortdesc: The All-in-One Digital Banking solution provides the advanced digital banking services, including integration with existing bank systems, storing and providing data, secure customer operations, executing transactions, and support for additional banking functionalities. The product includes the Authentication and Authorization solution along with other key components: Instant Data (GDS), Payments and Instructions (TPM), Integration Hub (IHUB), Service Proxy (SPX), Admin Console (WAC), PSD2 support service, Four Eyes, Notification Centre, Distribution, Exchange rates, Experience builder, Document generation service, Login application and Workspace GUI applications for bank clients and bank employees.
